item.title: Vista Outdoor 拒绝 MNC 的收购要约，同意 CSG 对该公司的甜价收购
item.description: Vista Outdoor 周一表示，它拒绝了投资公司 MNC Capital 修改后的收购要约，并同意捷克斯洛伐克集团（CSG）提高对其弹药部门的出价。【原文：Vista Outdoor said on Monday it was rejecting investment firm MNC Capital's revised offer to acquire the company and had agreed to an increased bid for its ammunitions unit from Czechoslovak Group (CSG).】

item.title: 美国股市冲上新高，法国股市出人意料
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 受飓风贝里尔影响，美国航空公司取消 1,300 多个航班
item.description: 由于飓风贝里尔加剧并登陆得克萨斯州，美国航空公司周一取消了 1300 多个航班。【原文：Airlines in the United States canceled more than 1,300 flights on Monday as Hurricane Beryl intensified and made landfall in Texas.】

item.title: 美国夏季高温和飓风创纪录，炼油厂汗流浃背，燃油价格可能飙升
item.description: 分析师表示，创纪录的高温和飓风的双重打击将在未来几周内考验美国炼油商的应变能力，从而提高了在旅游旺季燃油价格极度波动的风险。【原文：A double whammy of record heat and hurricanes should test U.S. refiners' resilience in coming weeks, raising the risk of extremely volatile fuel prices in the middle of the peak travel season, analysts said.】

item.title: 黄彪案庭审：Archegos 创始人的庭审接近尾声
item.description: 检察官将于周一辩称，黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）在其价值 360 亿美元的基金 Archegos Capital Management 于 2021 年倒闭中所扮演的角色应被定罪。【原文：Prosecutors will argue on Monday that Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang should be convicted for his role in the 2021 collapse of his $36 billion fund Archegos Capital Management, as a trial draws to a close in a case that Hwang's lawyers have said is based on an overly aggressive theory of market manipulation.】

item.title: 雅培因早产儿配方奶粉导致危险疾病的索赔案面临审判
item.description: Similac婴儿配方奶粉生产商雅培公司（Abbott）预计将于周一出庭受审，该公司生产的用于新生儿重症监护室的早产儿配方奶粉可能会导致一种致命的肠道疾病，这是美国数百起类似诉讼中的第二次庭审。【原文：Similac baby formula maker Abbott is expected to face a trial on Monday over claims that its formula for preterm infants used in neonatal intensive care units causes a potentially deadly bowel disease, the second trial out of hundreds of similar lawsuits in the United States.】

item.title: 特斯拉投资者敦促法官驳回马斯克薪酬案中创纪录的 70 亿美元诉讼费
item.description: 特斯拉股东将于周一出庭，辩称要求公司支付超过 70 亿美元的律师费这一史无前例的要求是 "离谱的"，这是马斯克 560 亿美元薪酬方案法律对决的最新进展。【原文：Tesla shareholders will appear in court on Monday to argue that an unprecedented request for more than $7 billion in attorneys' fees to be paid by the company is "outlandish," the latest twist in a legal showdown over Musk's $56 billion pay package.】

item.title: 拜登压力增大，投资者绘制可能的走势图表
item.description: 随着人们对总统乔-拜登是否会继续参选 2024 年连任的疑虑越来越大，一些投资者正准备在民主党出现更强有力的候选人时，对潜在的经济形势和交易进行博弈。【原文：With doubts growing about whether President Joe Biden will remain a candidate for re-election in 2024, some investors are preparing to game out potential economic scenarios and trades if a stronger Democratic candidate emerges.】

item.title: 摩根大通下调新兴市场企业违约预期
item.description: 投资银行摩根大通（JPMorgan）周一下调了对新兴市场公司债务违约数量的预期，此前不良级市场定价出现了自2016年以来最大的改善。【原文：Investment bank JPMorgan cut on Monday its forecast of the number of emerging market companies expected to default on their debt, following the biggest improvement in distressed-level market pricing since 2016.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车公司第二季度销售额下降
item.description: 德国卡车制造商戴姆勒卡车公司（Daimler Truck）周一公布的第二季度销售额下降了 15%，表明其卡车部门的市场趋于正常。【原文：German truck maker Daimler Truck reported a 15% drop in second quarter sales on Monday, pointing to a market normalization for its truck division.】

item.title: 欧元区投资者士气下降，"受挫 "打破连涨势头
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，欧元区的投资者士气打破了连续八个月的改善势头，7 月份的下降幅度超过预期，这一结果被称为 "痛苦的挫折"。【原文：Investor morale in the euro zone broke an eight-month streak of improvements with a bigger-than-expected decline in July, a survey showed on Monday, describing the results as a "bitter setback".】

item.title: 保时捷提前停产部分燃烧车型
item.description: 保时捷生产主管告诉《Automobilwoche》杂志，保时捷将坚持向电动汽车转型，提前结束部分内燃车型的生产。【原文：Porsche is sticking to its guns in its transition to electric vehicles, bringing forward the end of production of some internal-combustion models, the carmaker's head of production told magazine Automobilwoche.】

item.title: 中国 6 月汽车销量连续第三个月下滑
item.description: 中国 6 月份的汽车销量同比下降 6.9%，连续第三个月下滑，原因是在经济复苏乏力的情况下，政府的激励措施未能刺激消费需求。【原文：China's June car sales fell 6.9% from a year earlier, extending declines for a third straight month as government incentives failed to spur consumer demand in a sputtering economic recovery.】

item.title: 德国 5 月出口降幅超过预期
item.description: 联邦统计局周一公布的数据显示，由于中国、美国和欧洲国家需求疲软，德国5月份出口降幅超过预期。【原文：German exports fell more than expected in May, due to weak demand from China, the U.S and European countries, data from the federal statistics office showed on Monday.】

item.title: 德国保险机构下调 2024 年保费收入增长预期
item.description: 德国保险协会（GDV）周一表示，德国保险公司预计今年的保费收入增幅将有所下降，因为人寿保险业务正努力应对利率回升的延迟。【原文：German insurers expect to see a lower increase in premium income this year, the German Insurance Association (GDV) said on Monday, as the life insurance business struggles with a delayed turnaround in interest rates.】

item.title: 日本央行发出工资和物价上涨取得进展的信号
item.description: 日本央行表示，由于劳动力市场状况紧张，整个经济的工资上涨范围正在扩大，这表明它相信日本正在朝着持久实现2%的通胀目标迈进。【原文：The Bank of Japan said wage hikes were broadening across the economy due to tight labour market conditions, signalling its confidence the country was making progress toward durably achieving its 2% inflation target.】

item.title: 备忘录称派拉蒙将继续裁员直至 Skydance 交易完成
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司联合首席执行官周日在路透社看到的一份备忘录中表示，在与 Skydance Media 合并完成之前，该公司将继续缩减员工人数。【原文：Paramount Global will continue reducing the size of its workforce until its merger with Skydance Media closes, the company's co-CEOs said in a memo seen by Reuters on Sunday, hours after the companies announced the deal.】

item.title: 早间竞标法国左翼包抄右翼
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 美国司法部官员称，波音公司将在美国调查 737 MAX 致命坠机事件中认罪
item.description: 一名政府官员周日表示，波音公司已同意承认一项共谋欺诈的刑事指控，以解决美国司法部与两起 737 MAX 致命空难有关的调查。【原文：Boeing has agreed to plead guilty to a criminal fraud conspiracy charge to resolve a U.S. Justice Department investigation linked to two 737 MAX fatal crashes, a government official said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国央行在债券需求强劲的情况下调整流动性操作
item.description: 中国央行周一表示，将开始进行临时债券回购协议或逆回购，以提高公开市场操作的效率，保持银行系统流动性充裕。【原文：China's central bank said on Monday it would start conducting temporary bond repurchase agreements or reverse repos to make open market operations more efficient and keep banking system liquidity ample.】

item.title: 欧元因法国民调僵局而走低，美元在美国非农就业数据公布后表现低迷
item.description: 欧元周一下跌，因为法国大选的预测显示，左翼联盟的表现出乎意料地强劲，将导致议会悬而未决，这给法国的财政前景带来了新的不确定性。【原文：The euro slipped on Monday after projections from France's election pointed to a hung parliament amid an unexpectedly strong showing for a left-wing alliance, spawning fresh uncertainty over the country's fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 投资者关注贝里尔风暴对得克萨斯州的影响，石油价格变化不大
item.description: 在热带风暴贝里尔可能增强为飓风并于周一登陆之前，得克萨斯州最大的港口关闭，投资者担心能源供应中断，因此油价变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed as investors eyed energy supply disruption, with the largest ports in Texas shut before Tropical Storm Beryl likely strengthens into a hurricane and makes landfall on Monday.】

item.title: 日本 5 月经常账户盈余 177 亿美元
item.description: 日本财务省周一表示，由于创纪录的初次收入盈余超过了贸易逆差，日本 5 月份的经常账户盈余连续第 15 个月增长，这反映出日本的收入来源正在发生转变。【原文：Japan's current account surplus grew for the 15th straight month in May as a record primary income surplus more than offset the trade deficit, the Ministry of Finance said on Monday, reflecting an ongoing shift of the country's sources of earnings.】

item.title: 亚洲股市坚挺，欧元受法国大选僵局影响
item.description: 亚洲股市周一走高，原因是投资者对美国 9 月降息的信心增强，而欧元则因法国大选显示议会悬而未决而面临政治不确定性。【原文：Asian stocks inched higher on Monday as investors grew more confident about a September U.S. rate cut, while the euro grappled with political uncertainty as French elections pointed to a hung parliament.】

item.title: 韩国三星工会举行为期三天的罢工
item.description: 韩国三星电子公司的一个工会将从周一开始举行为期三天的罢工，并警告说可能会在晚些时候对这家韩国最强大的企业集团采取进一步行动。【原文：A workers' union at Samsung Electronics in South Korea is set to stage a three-day strike from Monday and has warned it could take further action against the country's most powerful conglomerate at a later date.】

item.title: 受通胀影响，日本实际工资连续 26 个月下降，创历史新高
item.description: 日本 5 月份经通胀调整后的实际工资连续第 26 个月下降，创下历史新高，这凸显了通胀带来的痛苦，通胀抑制了家庭支出，使日本央行实现货币政策正常化的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：Japan's inflation-adjusted real wages fell in May for a record 26th straight month, highlighting the pain of inflation that is dampening household spending and complicating the central bank's efforts to normalise monetary policy.】

item.title: 中国影响力日益增强，美澳致力于改善太平洋银行业
item.description: 美国和澳大利亚官员周一表示，他们将致力于改善太平洋地区的金融互联互通，来自该地区的贷款机构和政策制定者将举行会议，讨论在中国日益关注的情况下加强银行服务的问题。【原文：U.S. and Australian officials said on Monday they were committed to improving financial connectivity in the Pacific, as lenders and policymakers from across the region met to discuss bolstering banking services amid increasing interest from China.】

item.title: 消息人士称，派拉蒙全球特别委员会批准了与 Skydance Media 合并的计划
item.description: 一位接近交易的消息人士告诉路透社，随着一个特别委员会周日投票支持与他的 Skydance Media 合并，科技界的后代大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）离获得派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）的控制权又近了一步。【原文：Tech scion David Ellison moved one step closer to gaining control of Paramount Global , with a special committee voting Sunday to support a merger with his Skydance Media, a source close to the deal told Reuters.】

item.title: 早间竞标：乐观情绪高涨，软着陆指日可待
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 法国出口民调显示议会悬而未决，欧元下跌
item.description: 法国议会选举最后一轮的出口民调显示，左翼新人民阵线（New Popular Front）将意外赢得最多席位，导致议会悬而未决，欧元在周日下跌。【原文：The euro fell on Sunday after exit polls for the final round of the French parliamentary elections pointed to a hung parliament, with the left wing New Popular Front grouping unexpectedly set to win the most seats.】
